import React, {useState} from 'react' import {Link, NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' const Checkout = ({user, address}) => { //after 24 hour use of local storage, remove item. const [localSignatureMeal, setLocalSignatureMeal] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('signature-meal'))) const {first_name, last_name, email} = user.data const {street_address, address_number, city, state, zip_code, country} = address.data return ( //use effect the address here so when a user restarts it auto requests it //problem with the changing the address and going back to checkout (put random meal in localStorage when going back to checkout?) //conditional on picking a meal when it's already picked revert back to checkout for finalization. (24 hour timer)

Review Your Order

Shipping address

{first_name} {last_name}

{street_address === null ?

You current don't have a shipping address on your profile. Please update your address in order to continue checkout.

:

{street_address} {address_number}

{city}, {state} {zip_code}

{country}

}
Email address

{email}

Items on your cart
{!localSignatureMeal ?

Your cart is currently empty

:
{localSignatureMeal.mealTitle}
}

Item(s) total

Shipping

Sales tax

{!localSignatureMeal ?

$0.00

:

${localSignatureMeal.mealPrice}

}

FREE

$0.00

Order total

{!localSignatureMeal ?

$0.00

:

${localSignatureMeal.mealPrice}

}
{/* if someone tries to make an order either disable or modal your cart is empty */}

Terms and conditions

) } export default Checkout
